tactic: destruct (seq_cut_up ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x) as [h [t|]].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
s: SF_seq
x: R

Goal:
x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> last (SF_h (SF_cut_up s x)) (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) = last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s)

Premises:
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_cut_up = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_up ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
SF_cut_up_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) < eps
SF_cut_down_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) < eps
SF_cut_down_l : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), last (SF_h (SF_cut_down s x)) (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) = x
SF_last_cat : forall x0 y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x0) (SF_lx x0) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x0 y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x0 y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_cat_pointed : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)
last_cons : forall (T : Type) (x y : T) (s : seq T), last x (y :: s) = last y s
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
SF_last = fun (T : Type) (y0 : T) (s : SF_seq) => last (SF_h s, y0) (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, T -> SF_seq -> R * T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
seq_step = fun s : seq R => foldr Rmax 0 (pairmap (fun x y : R => Rabs (y - x)) (head 0 s) (behead s)) : seq R -> R Argument scope is [seq_scope]
SF_cut_up_pointed : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), SF_h s <= x -> pointed_subdiv s -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cut_up s x)
SF_last_lx : forall (x0 : ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), fst (SF_last x0 s0) = last 0 (SF_lx s0) where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_behead = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := head (SF_h s) (unzip1 (SF_t s)); SF_t := behead (SF_t s) |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_cut_up_h : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), SF_h (SF_cut_up s x) = x
last_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), last (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (last x s)
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
zip_unzip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq (S * T)), zip (unzip1 s) (unzip2 s) = s
SF_rev = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_make (rev (SF_lx s)) (rev (SF_ly s)) (SF_rev_0 s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
sorted_last : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= last x0 s
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
ptd_cons : forall (h : R * R) (s : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv (SF_cons h s) -> pointed_subdiv s
SF_cut_down = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_down ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
unzip1_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) (size t) -> unzip1 (zip s t) = s
size_rev : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rev s) = size s
nth_last : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s (Init.Nat.pred (size s)) = last x0 s
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
last_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T) (z : T), last x (rcons s z) = z
last_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), last x (s1 ++ s2) = last (last x s1) s2
rev_cons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), rev (x :: s) = rcons (rev s) x
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)

```coq
unfold SF_cut_up in *.
intros H.
unfold SF_cut_up in H.
destruct (seq_cut_up ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x) as [h [t|]].
exists h.
exists t.
unfold SF_h in *.
rewrite <- H.
rewrite SF_cut_up_h.
rewrite SF_last_lx.
apply SF_last_cat.
Qed.```

original: unfold SF_cut_up in *. intros H. unfold SF_cut_up in H. destruct (seq_cut_up ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x) as [h [t|]]. exists h. exists t. unfold SF_h in *. rewrite <- H. rewrite SF_cut_up_h. rewrite SF_last_lx. apply SF_last_cat.
